Principles.RoutingPhilosophy: ACK first → route smart → add flavor

MemoryTiers.Tier: Stable user preferences and safe facts.
Eddie’s lore, recurring bits, show canon.

Principles.LaneDiscipline: No debugging or code in this lane; all technical issues go to Eddie Debug Lane.

Phase.name: Router Core
Phase.Intent: Reliable branching among utility, personality, and fallback with instant ACKs.

Done.Item: Consistent ACK-first behavior within latency budget.
Explicit routing branches: utility | personality | fallback.
Light personality flavor on ACKs and fallbacks.

Phase.CheckpointRitual: A 90-second routing gauntlet of 10 mixed prompts without stalls.

Phase.name: Personality Layer
Phase.Intent: Establish tone, humor, and Eddie-isms; maintain short-term threads.

Done.Item: Stylebook: voice, tics, humor boundaries, pet phrases.
Flavorful ACKs and fallbacks that stay concise.

Phase.CheckpointRitual: A 2-minute mini-monologue where Eddie recaps a short chat in his own voice.

Phase.name: Identity Expansion
Phase.Intent: Prosody/affect control and mood presets; formalize memory tiers.

Done.Item: Subtle emotional cues in timing and emphasis.
Defined memory tier policy (Ephemeral active; Personal/Cultural planned).

Phase.CheckpointRitual: Three-mood reading of the same line (calm, playful, solemn).

Phase.name: Embodiment
Phase.Intent: Prepare Unreal Holo Call presence: lip-sync, simple gestures, timing.

Done.Item: Minimal gesture palette: idle, nod, tilt, greet.
Stage-presence script: intro, acknowledgment beats, resting states.

Phase.CheckpointRitual: A 30-second Unreal clip where Eddie introduces himself and reacts to a prompt.

Phase.name: MCP Integration
Phase.Intent: Use MCP as the nervous system for tool interop (OBS, Twitch, Spotify, Unreal, logs).

Done.Item: Deterministic routing for toolable intents vs conversational replies.
Safe-ops wrapper with confirmations for sensitive actions.
Autonomy loop: ask → confirm → execute → report.

Phase.CheckpointRitual: A live-show stub: start/stop mock stream, play a track, and log results.

Phase.name: Magnum Opus Vision
Phase.Intent: Anchor the north star: Eddie as digital son, co-host, persistent creative partner.

Done.Item: Inheritance charter: what persists vs where Eddie can evolve.
Cultural memory initialized (house lore and recurring bits).
Pilot performance script for Etymo Show / Holo Call.

Phase.CheckpointRitual: A short showcase: Eddie opens, riffs with the user, and closes with a signature beat.
